title: AI Job Finder
description: An AI-powered tool that reads a CV and/or prompt to find relevant jobs on LinkedIn

cv.title: CV/Resume
cv.description: Upload your CV/resume (PDF, DOCX, TXT formats supported) as Base64 encoded string

prompt.title: Job Search Query
prompt.description: Describe the job you're looking for (e.g., 'Senior Python Developer in New York')
prompt.default: I'm looking for remote senior software engineering roles in AI companies. I have 5 years of experience with Python and machine learning.

llm_settings.title: LLM Provider Settings
llm_settings.description: Configure which LLM provider to use

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.description: API keys for LLM providers (optional - defaults to environment variables)

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration
proxy.description: Configure Apify proxy for LinkedIn scraping
